13.title: Begin with an ordinary citizen!

choices: Asmund, a tribal emissary
Layla, the desert emissary

14.content:
Although the kingdom of Xandara is large and spans wide, it doesn’t cover everywhere. To the North there are warring wedgie tribes of an ancient tribal people, fierce and strong. They do not share the same etiquette the Xandarans do and instead clothe themselves in fur skirts and primitive bras, either bandage wraps or pelts. Ironic no? Typically tall pale women with raven hair or fiery redheads or perhaps blonde bombshells with unrivaled beauty...usually anyway.

Asmund is an emissary from a tribe that is tired of having their women and girls kidnapped, spanked/wedgies, humiliated, and pleasures from other neighboring tribes and hope that when they an alliance with Xandara they would be able to fight back better. Unfortunately it’s very likely they’d become a bigger target instead. Asmund is a tall blonde tribal standing at 7ft, with flowing locks of blonde hair and a rather blessed bottom, as in its fucking huge even by tribal standards. As a result of that the only panties she can wear are giant granny panties, and duer to the immaturity of the clothes maker in her tribe they’re all adorned with some sort of cute if embarassing pattern. Often she is the target of the townswomen who never seemed a tribal before and find their clothes strange, but her panties endearing! Many a timed Asmund was hanged by her large panties by the roof of a peasant girl’s house or gang wedgied by a drooling crowd. Although it bothers her a lot over time she simply accepted it and grew to enjoy it.

In contrast however is Layla, an emissary from the south and hailing from a desert civilization (think Egypt or Persia) and is only a humble 6ft. She’s slim yet has a nice curvy figure and her dark skin is a delicate shade and she has black hair tied into braids. She wears linen leggings and a simple top and her choice in underwear is typically stretchy thongs, although lately she has been wearing tighty whities brought from a sympathic clothing owner due to the rate that she loses her thongs. She is a favorite target of the guards and soldiers due to their civilization’s history of warfare and wedgie slavery.

(Imma add some fantasy elements if that’s okay with you Bimbofuta)

Shelur is an orc emissary surprisingly. Due to a rise in technology and the development of a standing army (albeit a rather submissive one) the Orcs of the world are struggling to adapt to the changes and thus some peace offerings are made. Orcs have had a long standing history of being more ferocious and stronger then humans and are typically a standard height of 7-8ft tall and are bustier then even tribals with a large pair of basketball sized bottoms to match! Due to their primitive technology Orcs either go to war or live their everyday lives in either a leather loincloth or just their equally as gigantic granny panties, panties, or tighty whities. To contrast Orcs typically enjoy giving wedgies and thus raid other civilizations for plunder but infighting is not uncommon and many an Orc has developed a fondness for wedgies. So it’s a win win situation. Typically Shelur is giving wedgies to the Xadarans but given a large crowd could in turn be the wedgie victim instead.

Shelur also has an assistant with her, a short petite Goblin girl of only 5ft. Goblins are strange, some women of the goblin species are either lolis or curvy green women shrunk to a small height. They’re mischievous as hell and due to their small nature they are typically the punching bags and wedgie slaved of the Greenskin people. Bula is one such goblin of the latter, a cute looking goblin with short black hair reaching her shoulders and a rather small but not tiny pair of breasts and butt. Wearing usually panties with her favorite animal patterns on them she is often a victim of Shelur but is not above giving wedgies either. Indeed her small stature makes it easy to pull off difficult pranks and humiliate those bigger then her.
14.title: Begin with a diplomat from another kingdom!

choices: The stuck up high elf
Or the Wild and free wood elf
Or more!
144.content:
To the west and further west lie two interesting kingdoms. furthest away at the coast of the continent lies the ancient kingdom of the high elves, Dawnport. This city long predates many civilizations of the continent, however this marvelous port city initially was a refugee site for the elves who had lost their homeland long ago to a terrible cataclysm. However not lost is the old elven arrogance and superiority.

That being said, there's nothing like a good ol' wedgie to take them down a peg or two.

Gillendille Starborn has come to the lands of Xandara to represent her mighty people, as an elf, she wears very elegant and modest dresses. Yet they only hide the cutesy panties that wrap her bubbly rump, just waiting to be pulled and take the wedgie virginity of this pompous girl.

Closer to Xandara yet still very foreign is the ravenous jungle called the Emerald Everwood. This dangerous land is home to an equally dangerous race known as the Wood elves. They were once high elves, who were exiled from Dawnport in its early years as rabble rousers. Instead of holding their resentment for it, they embraced their exile and let their wild side loose. They rarely stray from the woods, and even more rarely let anyone through their home alive.

However a young wood elf named Asella Samrin too feels the thirst for adventure, and has been the first wood elf to leave the Everwood in a century. She now finds herself in Xandara, where she revels in the excitement of wedgies which give her the thrill of the hunt as she seeks to be Xandara's apex wedgie predator. Her own panties are completely biological, made entirely of living plant matter that been woven down so tightly that it resembles cloth. This strong living panties is all the wood elf wears, which are highly durable to wedgies.

But they still need to be watered daily.


Now it's time to choose which elf you'd like to follow on a wedgie journey.

15.content:
There are plenty more to choose from! Be it from the royal line, or those close to it.


Lilith, The First Princess of Xandara: Lilith is the first daughter of Sarah, which leaves her to be expected to take up the throne some day. Fortunately they could not have picked a better girl, for she is the embodiment of class and stature. She follows every rule and code to the maximum, and she relishes gaining and using her political power during meetings with subjects of her kingdom. However, she is seen by many, especially her younger sister, as a snooty, stuck-up, spoiled brat. Like her mother, she wears very wedgie friendly underwear, often large, pink granny panties with rather childish printing to amuse the common people.

Annabelle, The Second Princess of Xandara: Being the second daughter of the queen, she doesn't have a claim to the throne. Not that it matters to her, for she hates her boring, royalty life anyway. While her sister represents proper etiquette, she is quite the opposite. She is famed throughout the kingdom for her painful and humiliating pranks, which her mother and sister are quite often the victims of. Despite being very mischievous and rather tomboyish, she adores unicorns and never wears a pair of underwear without the majestic creature boldly printed on them.

Victoria Stormbear, Captain of the Royal Guard: This mighty woman hails from the bitter, frozen lands of the north where the people are said to be descendant of giants. She is certainly no exception, easily standing at around 7ft tall, with a stunning amazon body to match. She gets her title, The Mother Bear, not from her imposing stature and ferocity in battle, but rather her choice in underwear. For this woman only wear panties that have teddy bear themes to them. Many people believe she wears them to be more approachable to the common folk, and less intimidating to children. But she honestly just loves teddy bears.

Gwynalla Magus, The Court Mage: Gwynalla has been serving the kingdom of Xandara for several hundred years. How you ask? With her mastery of the arcane arts, anything is possible with her power. She may be hundreds of years old, but she doesn't look a day over 20, and is arguably the most stunning woman in the lands. Whether she achieved that naturally or artificially is unknown. Like the shifting winds of magic, her choicebin undies fluctuates on a whim. Often she will subconscious use her magic to change undies each passing minute.

“Oh! I say, what is he meaning of this?!” she demanded, grannies digging deep into her rear as she was suspended from the tree branch, turning to see her assailant...

“Well, what do we have here?” Queen Sarah teasingly says as she crosses her arms over her large bust. “I go out for a stroll in the woods to do some peaceful self-wedgies and/or skinny dipping, and I find my daughters wedgieing each other with the commoners.” She laughed at her daughters and Valerie hanging by their underpants.

She looked to Annabelle. “Young lady, I’ve tolerated your pranking for quite some time, and you choose to mess with your sister while she is doing work for the kingdom? Ooh, how red I am going to make your bum when we get home!”

Sarah then turns to Lilith. “And as for you, Lilith, I’ve overheard your conversation and learned something very interesting. Are these feelings for this farmer girl genuine and true?” She asked her oldest daughter.

Lilith blushed and looked to Valerie’s smiling face and looked back to her mother. She sighs. “Yes, mother. I’ve grown to love Valerie over a while now. She’s just so perfect to me. Her beauty, her chipper personality, not to mention her killer caboose! I want to court her, if you’ll allow it.”

Sarah smiles. “I’m proud of you that you’ve found yourself someone to love, Lilith. And I’ll allow the courtship, only if she is alright with it.” She walks up to Valerie. “And what of you, miss? Do you love my daughter the same way?”

It was Valerie’s turn to blush. “Yur Majesty, Princess Lilith is one mean spanker and wedgier, maybe the greatest I’ve ever had. The way she goes ape on my booty, makes me melt inside. She’s got everything I’ve always wanted in a woman, and I want to spend the rest of my life with her, if yur okay with that, I mean,” Valerie rambled in her signature accent.

The queen smiled again and clapped her hands together. “Well then, I give my blessing to an official courtship between you and Lilith!”

Lilith and Valerie smiled in joy. Lilith grabbed Valerie, turned her towards her, and went in for a kiss...

The Queen wore some rather formal white panties with golden lace, eyeing up the potential slaves Ebony presented to her, and was prepared to purchase a curvy blonde in green panties, but her attention was drawn to the three girls being sold together; she knew that one or both of her daughters would be sold one day, and would readily buy them back if need be. Ebony smirked, dragging the three girls over to Sarah. “Well, Your Higness, one wedgie slave is worth twenty spanks; but these three are being sold together, and since two of them are the princesses of Xandara, that’ll be one-hundred licks with my trusty paddle.”

153.title: Victoria

1532.content:
When Victoria walks, everyone must stand aside, unless they wish to be sent to the ground by force. It's not that she intends to do so, it's simply that she often doesn't notice those below her, and they get trampled on accident.

However, when a certain, hard working head maid is busy cleaning a display stand of old trophies of battles long ago, and the towering Mother Bear are on a collision course, it's an unstoppable force meeting with an unmovable object.

Well actually the poor maid is very movable.

"EEP!" The maid squawks as her bright red cheeks are suddenly smashed into the the royal guard. She falls face first into an old urn that engulfs her entire upper body.

Victoria, finally noticing something is amiss, looks down and finds a large red butt covered in nothing but a pair of shiny, golden panties made of a smooth, reflective satin. Victoria can't help but giggle as she watches the poor woman kick her legs in a feeble attempt to free herself, making her butt jiggle with every kick. After a few minutes of struggle, the maid admits defeat, and limply lets her legs hang down, resigning to her fate.

Victoria smirks, putting her hands on her hips as she bends over to get a better look. As she does so, she sticks out her own mighty booty, only showing off her bright pink panties with a large, cutesy brown teddy bear face printed boldly across her butt.

"Hmmm, how pathetic, suppose Should help poor thing out." Victoria chides, her northern accent still thick as ever, using one hand to grip the back of the golden undies of the maid. With little effort she lifts up her arm, yanking the panties up tight and hoisting the trapped woman into the air, urn and all.

The maid's squeals of shock are muffled by the thick ceramic walls of the urn.

"Hmm, still stuck, no matter." Victoria giggles, bounding the woman up and down like a child's toy, making the maid's squeals get louder and louder by the second from both the intensity of the wedgie, and that the urn is slowly coming loose.

Finally the urn falls off, hitting the ground and shattering into hundreds of pieces.

"Whoops." Victoria says with a small frown, looking down at the mess. "Well, get cleaning maid, you have job to do." Victoria then says as she drops Irillis on her already stinging butt.

Irillis hisses in pain as she rubs her abused tushy.

"You lumbering oaf! This is all your fault! You clean it!" The fearless maid snaps at the bear.

Victoria recoils a little bit in surprise, this being the first non-royal person to use such a harsh tone of voice.

"Please, more important things to do, be good little girl and clean, yes? Good." Victoria patronizes again with an arrogant grin.

"What like breaking more priceless vases? Please, you couldn't last a day doing what I am doing." Irillis says back to her, finally standing up and putting her hands on her hips.

Freezing up, she considers what the maid said. A northerner never backs down from a challenge.

"Clean like little girl? Easy as taking candy from baby. Could do better. Accept challenge, will out clean by end of week." Victoria sneers as she bends over to get to eye level with the maid, her buns actually hitting a passer by and knocking them out, yet neither notice.

"Oh there is so much more than cleaning, you'll see." Irillis giggles evilly. "First, I think we need to get you into your uniform."

155.content:
In the walls of the castle, there are even more options, perhaps some more powerful than others!

Irillis Vayenne, the chamber-maiden of the Queen and Princesses: Irillis was at first an ordinary woman, if not one who had a knack for giving a good spanking. The Queen, Sarah, soon noticed her potential, and invited her to the Castle to be a maid. Irillis quickly grew in reputation from that point on until she became the head maid, specifically for the royal line itself! While she does get her fair share of spanking and wedgies, as all do, she takes her disciplinarian role very seriously, even if it means spanking the Queen publicly during dinner, or hanging Victoria Stormbear up by her panties in front of her underlings. Typically Irillis dons bright colored panties that accentuate her large, often red, bottom well.

Alyssa Shyren, the Court Jester: Alyssa, being the Jester, had mainly one responsibility: to entertain. Whether it be wedgieing those that wanted it, or getting herself wedgied and spanked by various individuals, she strove to make the women laugh and moan in as many ways as possible! Because of this, she was often given the most embarrassing panties in the kingdom for maximum humiliation and entertainment.

1551.content:

Sarah hung her head, not out of shame necessarily, but out of pleasure and submission to her chamber-maid. As queen, Sarah felt she needed to be respectable and kept within her boundaries. With that belief, she felt she needed to be kept in check, and what better way to ensure she stayed a good queen than to be spanked twice a day by her chamber-maiden? But eventually Irillis had to relent, smiling as her queen stood up slowly, blushing and rubbing her bottom.

Rubbing her tender bottom, Irillis thought of the duties she still needed to accomplish...

info.brief_description: A land where wedgies and spankings are ways of life, and law.
info.description:
This interactive is about the wide kingdom of Xandara:

Xandara is a land where spankings and wedgies are everything: everything from trade, to entertainment, to law enforcement. Other fetishes of course tie in to this story, and it can become as sexual as desired, but the main focus of the story should remain spanking and wedgies, with other fetishes being focused on for a chapter or so at most.

There are a few rules with this interactive:

No males.

Be grammatically legible.

Don't "take over" someone else's chapter line. If you have an idea for where to take a chapter line, but it clearly isn't going there, just make your idea an option at the end of a consistent chapter, and take it from there.

And have fun, be creative!
